data.title: Koka Philips
data.meta_description: Contact Koka Philips from Middletown on The Bash. Browse Beach Band prices, photos, and 22 reviews, with a rating of 5 out of 5.
data.text: What happens when two Five Star Gigmaster entertainers join forces. Well you will have to listen to find out. Gary PhilipS; and Koka; We take the best of both worlds outstanding vocals and hypnotic steel drum to bring life to your event. Gary is a five star Gigmaster solo entertainer who has performed up and down the east coast. He also plays ukulele and was nominated for Male Vocalist of the year in 2012 for the Jersey Acoustic Music Awards. Tom not only plays steel drums but also flute and various percussion instruments. Their music is influenced by the likes of Jimmy Buffett, Bob Marley, The Beatles, the Eagles and many others. They play anything from oldies to current music with anything in between.
